Comments_List: The basis and causes of disorders and how to treat and diagnose them
Dsm 5 criteria, key research topics in abnormal psych, different types models and frameworks to understand abnormal psych

I learned about different manifestations of abnormal psychology, such as psychiatric disorders, and how they present themselves in patients in terms of etiology, risk factors, symptoms, and treatment methods.
U learned about many different mental disorders, the etiology, symptoms, and treatment.

This class was super interesting and the instructors were amazing, very knowledgeable and helpful! The format of the class was great and the discussion sections were helpful but the material was very quickly gone through and I feel like I didnt have a lot of time to comprehend the material.
Very interesting discussion sections. Reading the textbook is totally unnecessary to succeed in the course.
I would prefer an in-person version of this summer course, if possible.
I thought it was incredibly well done. No weaknesses honestly. The professor and TA were incredible and very friendly and accessible.
Yes! Because the format was very laid back but also very informative
Definitely. Interesting discussions about topics in mental health that are important for anyone.

Yes I would! I learned about the current developments in the field of abnormal psychology, the continuing issue of stigmatization of psychiatric disorders, and the complicated, elaborate, yet still incomplete treatment options that are available for patients.
Yes! Professor Joormann is an incredible teacher and mentor.
